summary: As the first direct flight from China smoothly landed in Edinburgh, Scotland the new visitors must be asking themselves where...
body:
As the first direct flight from China smoothly landed in Edinburgh, Scotland the new visitors must be asking themselves where they should visit .

The amazing scenery of the Highlands of Scotland should be at the top of their list . Photo tours of the Highlands can be booked online .

Glencoe , take a photo tour of the Highlands

 

 

 

 

Edinburgh is the second only to London as the most…

View On WordPress

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY

summary: barty, break up with regulus. he doesn’t deserve you.
question: barty, break up with regulus. he doesn’t deserve you.
answer: Barty: He really hurt me but I also remember how much it hurt when we weren’t together and I don’t think I could go through that again…

summary: i have nobody else that i can come out to, so i'm going to come out to regulus, barty, and antonin (and hannah)!! i'm...
question: i have nobody else that i can come out to, so i'm going to come out to regulus, barty, and antonin (and hannah)!! i'm non-binary!!
answer:
((OOC: I’m proud of you ☺️))

Regulus: Well done for being brave. We all love you.

Barty: I don’t know what non-binary means but if you’re coming out then you’re cool and I like you.

Antonin: I don’t even fucking know you… but okay.

summary: Radio Potter
body:
Radio Potter

Lee Jordan: E tu cosa diresti, Royal, a quegli ascoltatori che obiettano che in tempi così pericolosi dovrebbe valere il motto “prima i maghi”?

Kingsley: Direi che da “prima i maghi” a “prima i purosangue” e infine a “prima i Mangiamorte” il passo è breve. Siamo tutti esseri umani, no? Ogni vita ha lo stesso valore e merita di essere salvata.

~ Harry Potter e i Doni della Morte

summary:
Ravenclaw: Oh my goodness what happened to your ankle.
Gryffindor: Don’t worry it’s just a minor sprain. See it’s a funny story...
body:
Ravenclaw: Oh my goodness what happened to your ankle.

Gryffindor: Don’t worry it’s just a minor sprain. See it’s a funny story I was duelling with some death eaters and-

Ravenclaw: Gryff.

Gryffindor: Okay. Okay. I was pranking Slytherin when-

Ravenclaw: Gryff.

Gryffindor: Forbidden forest?

Ravenclaw: *disapproving nod*

Gryffindor: Fine. I was in the shower and I slipped.

Ravenclaw: *continues look*

Gryffindor: *mumbling* I was dancing to k-pop in the shower when I slipped okay.

blog.name: storytime-writings
blog.title: part of the journey is the end
blog.description: 23 | aussie | aroace | classics grad | loving fiction and hating life | sideblog: @storytime-reviews

summary: 3 Fandoms Tag Game
title: 3 Fandoms Tag Game
body:
Thanks @thereadingchallengechallenge​ for tagging me!!!

Rules: Choose any three fandoms and answer the questions, then tag people you want to know better.

The three chosen fandoms:

  1. Harry Potter series
  2. Agents of SHIELD
  3. Percy Jackson various series

The first character you loved:

  1. Hermione Granger-an intelligent kid obsessed with reading and always studying? That was literally me at her age, and I loved that she never felt ashamed of it!
  2. Phil Coulson-although Melinda May is my absolute fave, Coulson was the first character I loved on this show. After all, he existed before the show existed!
  3. Percy Jackson-again, Annabeth is actually my fave, but who doesn’t love the hilarious Percy?

The character you never expected to love so much:

  1. Neville Longbottom-I think very few people realised in the first book that Neville would become one of the best characters in Harry Potter.
  2. Melinda May-I had no idea when I first started watching AOS that May would become my favourite character ever, and be such an inspiration. Words cannot describe how much I love her. 
  3. Clarisse La Rue-she was such an asshole, but I came to love her wit and rivalry with Percy, especially as she grew up and became better. She’s such a strong character, and I always wish that she had more scenes!

The character you relate to the most:

  1. Hermione Granger-as I said above, she is actually so much of what I was like at her age, and I loved her for it. 
  2. Melinda May-there’s so much that I appreciate about her, I relate to the way she interacts with others and tries to keep to herself, and honestly I relate to a lot of her decisions and opinions throughout the show. 
  3. Annabeth Chase-probably I related to her intelligence as a kid because I was always so studious. But I also think she bravely stands her ground, and I like to think I have a bit of that too. More negatively, she can be quite harsh, and I definitely have some of that. 

Character you’d slap:

  1. Draco Malfoy-what an asshole. Hermione you did good. 
  2. Grant Ward-words cannot describe my extreme hatred for him…
  3. Luke Castellan-should have been better, he made many bad choices because of his father.

Three favorite characters:

  1. Hermione Granger, Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley
  2. Melinda May, Daisy Johnson, Phil Coulson
  3. Percy Jackson, Annabeth Chase, Clarisse La Rue

Character you liked at first, but don’t like anymore:

  1. Cho Chang-she just started to really frustrate me tbh…
  2. Grant Ward-should be pretty obvious that I started hating him after the Hydra reveal…
  3. I honestly can’t think of any…

The characters you didn’t like at first, but do now:

  1. Draco Malfoy-yes I know he’s done a lot of terrible things, but I do really enjoy his character, and did feel a bit sorry for him because of his family. Doesn’t excuse what he did, but explains some of it and I like to think he’s a much better person now. 
  2. Lincoln Campbell-I just found him really boring and bland at first, but much later I came to really enjoy his character and interactions with Daisy.
  3. Clarisse La Rue-she wasn’t very nice, but I came to appreciate the good aspects of her character and she did grow up into a better person. And her rivalry with Percy was great!

Three OTPs:

  1. Harry and Ginny
  2. Philinda!
  3. Percabeth

Tagging:

@afragmentofyourfears @quakescavalry @loved-the-stars-too-fondly @i-believe-in-melinda-may  @heroesofmyheart @carolineaquino73  @myownlittlebookcorner @silvereyedslytherin @eggtartclub @youthbookreview and anyone else that might be interested?

The characters you didn’t like at first, but do now:

  1. Draco Malfoy-yes I know he’s done a lot of terrible things, but I do really enjoy his character, and did feel a bit sorry for him because of his family. Doesn’t excuse what he did, but explains some of it and I like to think he’s a much better person now. 
  2. Lincoln Campbell-I just found him really boring and bland at first, but much later I came to really enjoy his character and interactions with Daisy.
  3. Clarisse La Rue-she wasn’t very nice, but I came to appreciate the good aspects of her character and she did grow up into a better person. And her rivalry with Percy was great!

Three OTPs:

  1. Harry and Ginny
  2. Philinda!
  3. Percabeth

Tagging:

@afragmentofyourfears @quakescavalry @loved-the-stars-too-fondly @i-believe-in-melinda-may  @heroesofmyheart @carolineaquino73  @myownlittlebookcorner @silvereyedslytherin @eggtartclub @youthbookreview and anyone else that might be interested?

blog.name: tonlcs
blog.title: eat, you'll feel better
blog.description:
★ tori ★
☽ hufflepuff ☾
★ has a lot of feelings about remus lupin and nymphadora tonks and is more than happy to tell you all about it ★
☽ harry potter sideblog, main @ soarlikeacomet ☾

tags: look yeah snape could have made the logical leap that tonks' patronus was a wolf like remus'
but it almost makes more sense if snape KNOWS remus' patronus
so let's toss in some more heartbreak
summary: i’ve seen a lot of really cute marauders-era patronus stories so time for a heartbreaking one remus lupin adores defence against...
body:
i’ve seen a lot of really cute marauders-era patronus stories so time for a heartbreaking one

remus lupin adores defence against the dark arts, he’s passionate about it and he’s near-on top of the class, but he’s been dreading this day. his teacher is crochety and insists that all students attempt to conjure a patronus in front of the entire seventh-year class or they will receive a ‘troll’ grade for insolence.

remus lupin has been able to cast a corporeal patronus for six months, now -the first time he did it, it was in the dorm room with his best friends - they were all trying to pretend that it wasn’t what it was - that it was a big shaggy dog, or maybe it was a coyote - but remus knew.

so during the last lesson of the year, he gets up in front of the class, and makes a decision - he wasn’t going to get a ‘troll’ for his favourite class, he just wasn’t. and so he casts his patronus, and the second the wolf starts running around the room, no matter how clearly or gracefully, the whole room starts whispering. the marauders try to keep remus’ attention on them. they can’t. he runs out of the room, leaving his professor perplexed as he gives remus an ‘outstanding’.

severus snape laughs to himself.

the marauders weren’t the only ones in the classroom that day, of course, and the consequences of remus’ corporeal patronus would follow him throughout the rest of his life. and not only him, but his loved ones too. nymphadora tonks’ patronus changes to a wolf, the same as remus’, and one of his former classmates mocks her because he still knows. tonks skulks off after the comments. and, as she does,

severus snape laughs to himself.

when remus finds out, months after the fact, he feels most profoundly that he should have just taken the ‘troll’.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY
